trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be set to a value within a range.
Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern.
Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.
`true` if the value is read-only; `false` if it can be modified.

Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value"></xref> property when a large change is made, such as with the PAGE DOWN key.

The large-change value supported by the control or null (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.LargeChange"></xref>.
Gets the maximum range value supported by the control.

The maximum value supported by the control or null (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Maximum"></xref>.
Gets the minimum range value supported by the control.

The minimum value supported by the control or null (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Minimum"></xref>.
Sets the value of the control.
The actual value set depends on the control implementation.
The control may round the requested `value` up or down.
When value is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the control.

Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value"></xref> property when a small change is made, such as with an arrow key.

The small-change value or null (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.SmallChange"></xref>.
Gets the value of the control.

The value of the control or null (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value"></xref>.
